body.p: Grew up on the Ohio and Kentucky border. Enlisted in the 3rd Kentucky Cavalry Regiment on December 13, 1861. Promoted to Major on December 18, 1862. Participated in the capture of Confederate raider John Hunt Morgan on July 26, 1863, near Salineville, Ohio. Mustered out of the Army on August 5, 1865 as a lieutenant colonel.
